title: Everything in life
creator_credit: Tudor Films, George Loftus and J. Elder Wills
brief_description: A musical comedy about a European musical star who comes to England to make a film. She refuses the script offered and storms out of the office bumping into a would-be author who thinks she has been sacked. Not knowing who she reeally is, romance ensues. Stars Gitta Alpar and Neil Hamilton.
